documentation.content: Alerts when the sum of ingress and egress bytes exceeds 50% of the 3-Gbps (375 MBps) limit for a given VPN tunnel.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch vpn_gateway
| { metric vpn.googleapis.com/network/sent_bytes_count
; metric vpn.googleapis.com/network/received_bytes_count }
| align rate (1m)
| group_by [metric.tunnel_name]
| outer_join 0,0
| value val(0) + val(1)
| condition val() > 187.5 "MBy/s"
